title: Pset_FurnitureTypeTable
description: HISTORY: First issued in IFC Release R1.5. Renamed from Pset_Table

WorksurfaceArea.title: WorksurfaceArea

NumberOfChairs.title: NumberOfChairs
NumberOfChairs.description: Maximum number of chairs that can fit with the table for normal use.
